SENT.plain: We used flow cytometry to measure the activities of cathepsin G and elastase
The activity of elastase in neutrophils from patients with myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) was significantly lower than that in neutrophils from the control group (P<.001)
Patients with low elastase activity were significantly susceptible to infection (P<
Our study suggests that analyzing antibacterial enzymes is useful in evaluating the prognosis of patients with MDS
